title: Son of Man
description: What compelled Yeshua to leave Nazareth to be baptized by the Prophet John on the Jordan River? Did he know he was the Messiah? 'Son of Man' is a fictional account of Yeshua's journey down Nazareth Mountain, across the Jezreel Valley, into the mountains of Samaria, and on to the Jordan River to finally confront his fateful, inspired destiny.
author: Welles Bristol
